mapper.insert: insert into db_customertype (SID, 'NAME', DESCR, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2) values (#{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_customertype set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where SID = #{sid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SID, 'NAME', DESCR, OPER, OPERTIME, OPENFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2 from db_customertype
